layers.title: Plots with No Development Slopes
layers.description:
Survey numbers with No Development Slopes (NDS). The output location of plots having atleast 25% of the plot area with NDS or slopes greater than 1:4 (25% slope).
Processed using slope computed with NASADEM 30m data and cadastral boundaries from OneMapGoa GIS. See processing code for details.
layers.attribution: CC-BY Plots with No Development Slopes by amche.in community

layers.title: Communidade Land
layers.description: Land parcels governed by the Code of Communidades

layers.title: Cadastral Plot Boundaries
layers.description: Cadastral Boundaries from the Department of Land Records. The map is provided for information purpose only. An official copy can be obtained from Goa Online

layers.title: Slope Zoning
layers.description:
Slope zone classification using NASA NASADEM 30m for entire Goa and ISRO CartoDEM 2.5m (Bardez) terrain data for Bardez taluka.
The output is a 30x30m grid indicating the minimum gradient within that cell. Details of the algorithm are in the slope processor script.

layers.title: Landcover
layers.description: Space based Information Support for Decentralized Planning (SISDP) Phase 2 10k Land Usage Land Cover data. Check the SISDP technical manual for background about the project and Bhuvan Panchayat Portal User Manual for more details.

layers.title: Geomorphological Lineaments
layers.description: Geomorphological lineaments based on genesis based classification schema.

layers.title: Groundwater Prospects
layers.description:
Groundwater prospect maps prepared at 1:50k scale. Refer to the methodology and user manual for more details. Check INDIA-Groundwater Resource Estimation System (IN-GRES) for taluk level groundwater assessment reports.
View Dynamic Groundwater Report of Goa State 2022 | 2024.
layers.attribution: Bhuvan - Bhujal, Ministry of Drinking Water and Sanitation - Collected by Datameet Community

layers.title: Geomorphological Ecozones
layers.description: Geomorphological landforms based on genesis based classification schema.

layers.title: Goa Admiralty Chart (1914)
layers.description: Nautical chart of the West Coast of India from Achra River to Cape Ramas. Surveyed by Lieut. A.D. Taylor 1853-4 for Eat India Company. Not current - not to be used for navigation!
layers.attribution: Wikimedia Commons: Admiralty Chart No 740 West Coast of India, Published 1858, New Edition 1914 via Wikimaps Warper released in public domain

layers.title: Atlas of India (1827-1906)
layers.description: Historical atlas of India published in 1827-1906 by Survey of India
layers.attribution: Wikimedia Commons: Atlas of India (1827-1906) via Wikimaps Warper released in public domain

layers.title: Geological Map of India (1855)
layers.description: General sketch of the physical and geological features of British India. Compiled by Greenough, George Bellas (1778-1855)
layers.attribution: Wikimedia Commons: Greenough Geology India 1855 via Wikimaps Warper released in public domain

layers.title: Lambtons Peninsular Survey  (1802-1814)
layers.description: Historical trignometrical survey plans by Colnel William Lambton of the Peninsula of India
layers.attribution: Wikimedia Commons: Lambtons peninsular survey via Wikimaps Warper released in public domain

layers.title: Robert Wilkinsons General Atlas  (1792)
layers.description: Engraved by Thomas Conder and issued as plate no. 37 in the 1792 edition of Robert Wilkinsons General Atlas
layers.attribution: Wikimedia Commons: Southern India Wilkinson.png via Wikimaps Warper released in public domain

layers.title: Goa Harbour Admiralty Chart (1775)
layers.description: Nautical chart of the West Coast of India from Achra River to Cape Ramas. Surveyed by Lieut. A.D. Taylor 1853-4 for Eat India Company. Not current - not to be used for navigation!
layers.attribution: Wikimedia Commons: Admiralty Chart No 793 Goa Harbour, with a View, Published 1775 via Wikimaps Warper released in public domain
